title: Social Animal
description: Innocence is a beautiful thing, unless it hinders you from acknowledging the real dangers of an alien and untamed world.  The banda are playful yet dangerous equine creatures native to Cassiopeia. Their natural curiosity has finally negated their timidity or fear of the citizens of the Cepheus colony. A deadly visit was bound to happen one day and that day was finally upon them. These colonists would understandably risk their lives for the people they love and when it comes to a potential banda attack, they'd do that without question! Someone is going to sacrifice what they have for the hero of the Cepheus Colony. Ani Maxima, however, isn’t the sort of person to just accept what's happened. She is going to fight for that hero and demand that the hero fights for her! After all, just like the rodents living under the porch, she’s a social animal. She requires social interaction to survive. Take away her loved ones, and you take away her life. The Ani Maxima Files: Ptolemy’s Child SuperVirus Veiled Sky Enigma Flying in the Rain Silent Lucidity Flesh and Blood Soul Sister Social Animal   The entire Ani Maxima series was voted in the top 10 for "Best Kindle Space Opera" and "Best Amazon Prime Books to Borrow" by Goodreads!  Brought to you by the international bestselling author of the Mystic Saga, Dominion, Beyond the Event Horizon, Maelstrom, Endeavor, and Ghosts of Ophidian.
